meanings.definition: The plural form of 'heid', meaning head or leader.
meanings.sent1: The heids of the group gathered to discuss the plan.
meanings.sent2: She bumped her heids together accidentally.
meanings.sent3: The heids of the family always make the decisions.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the heids are crucial for strategy.
meanings.sent5: The heids of the company met to brainstorm ideas.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person's head or mind.
meanings.sent1: He bumped his heids on the low doorway.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't get the song out of her heids all day.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe you have such crazy ideas in your heids!
meanings.sent4: Her heids were spinning with excitement after the roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The heids of the students were filled with curiosity during the science experiment.
